SELECT board_id AS id, a.user_id AS userId, board_name AS NAME, layout_json AS layout, a.folder_id AS folderId, f.folder_name AS folderName, f.is_private AS folderIsPrivate, u.user_name AS userName, u.login_name AS loginName, a.create_time AS createTime, a.orderNum AS orderNum, a.update_time AS updateTime FROM dashboard_board a LEFT JOIN dashboard_user u ON u.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN dashboard_folder f ON a.folder_id = f.folder_id WHERE #{0} = '${admin_user_id}' OR a.user_id = #{0} OR a.board_id IN ( SELECT res_id FROM dashboard_user_role ur LEFT JOIN dashboard_role_res rr ON ur.role_id = rr.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{0} AND rr.res_type = 'board' ) ORDER BY a.folder_id ASC
